result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

Attorney Russell Jones is appointed as counsel of record.  Defendant is to reimburse the county pursuant to the standard collection practices of the Clerk of Court office.
Instructions for How to Appear Remotely.
Preliminary hearing on July 21, 2022 at 10:30 am.

1:31 pm - Prosecuting attorney Jill L. Vendetti appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Sherard Kevin Nance appeared by video, in custody, at Milwaukee Secure Detention.  Public defender has not found an attorney for this matter yet.  Court finds good cause to toll the time period for the preliminary hearing to be held.  The Court explains to the defendant the difference between a public defender appointment and a court appointed attorney.  The defendant indicates that Attorney Russell Jones is will to take this case, if the court would appoint him.  The Court will reach out to Attorney Jones.
Preliminary hearing scheduled for July 21, 2022 at 10:30 am.

Notice to Party Furnishing Cash Bail.
 - Amanda Smith @ 20253 S. Yates Blvd., Chicago, IL 60617
Commitment for Failure to Furnish Bail.

BAIL HEARING - 
Defendant in custody and appearing by video from the Manitowoc County Jail.  The State informs the Court that the defendant will be charged with the crimes of possess Fentanyl with intent to deliver, possess THC-2nd offense, possess paraphernalia, possess controlled substances on or near certain places.  The matters are continued for initial appearance on 06-06-22 at 1:30 p.m. Br. 3.  Bail is set at $1,500.00 cash with the condition the he maintain absolute sobriety.  Bail not furnished and defendant is remanded into custody.  Commitment for failure to furnish bail issued. Copy filed.
